definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: south of Gaza, usually identif. with mod. Umm Jerâr Bd:Pal 159 Guêrin:Judêe ii. 257 ff.; but Wady Jerūr W. of ‘ Ain Ḳadīs acc. to Trumbull:Kadesh Barnea 61 ff. cf. Guthe:ZPV viii 1885, 215; Ge 20:2, Ge 26:6, Ge 26:20, Ge 26:26, 2Ch 14:12, 2Ch 14:13; [[גְּרָ֫רָה]] Ge 10:19, Ge 26:1; [[נַ֫חַל גְּרָר]] Ge 26:l7; [[וַיׇּגׇר בִּגְרָר]] Ge 20:1.
